'''"For The Harbingers!"''' is a basic daily [[commission]] in Teyvat.

==Steps==
{{Quest Description||The Fatui are gathering to whisper and plot some nefarious scheme. They must not be allowed to run amok any longer!}}
# Defeat all opponents (0/X)

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}

==Enemies==
===Dragonspine===
;3 enemies in 2 waves
Wave 1:
* {{Enemy List|Fatui Electrohammer Vanguard;Fatui Geochanter Bracer}}
Wave 2:
* {{Enemy|Fatui Cryogunner Legionnaire|x=1}}

===Entombed City - Outskirts===
;3 enemies in 2 waves
Wave 1:
* {{Enemy List|Fatui Anemoboxer Vanguard;Fatui Geochanter Bracer}}
Wave 2:
* {{Enemy|Fatui Cryogunner Legionnaire|x=1}}

===Narukami Island===
;4 enemies in 2 waves
Wave 1:
* {{Enemy List|Fatui Anemoboxer Vanguard;Fatui Pyroslinger Bracer}}
Wave 2:
* {{Enemy List|Fatui Cryogunner Legionnaire;Fatui Geochanter Bracer}}

==Notes==
* There are no distinct waves, whenever an enemy is killed, the next in line spawns.
